briefTitle: Family History App in Personalized Medicine
officialTitle: Family History App in Personalized Medicine (FHAMe): A Pilot Randomized Controlled Trial
conditions: Cancer, Breast, Cancer, Ovarian, Cancer, Colorectal, Cancer, Prostate, Melanoma, Coronary Artery Disease, Diabetes Mellitus, Type 2
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Proportion of patients with new documentation of family history in EMR
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* 30-69 years of age

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnancy
* Must be patients of staff physicians (i.e. no resident patients)
* Must have email address registered in the OCEAN system
